properties.say: Bienvenido a la línea de ayuda del banco de alimentos de la comunidad del condado de alameda. Para español, oprima dos.
Hello from Alameda County Community Food Bank. We can help connect you to emergency food resources. For English, press 1.
I'm sorry, that's an invalid selection
Ok, what city are you located in?
properties.hints: Berkeley, Albany, Oakland, Alameda, San Leandro, Hayward, San Lorenzo, Castro Valley, Union City, Newark, Livermore, Dublin, Pleasanton, Sonol, Emeryville, Fremont, Piedmont, Ashland, Cherryland, Fairview

properties.say: Thanks, just a moment please.
I can help you find food in {{widgets.valid_city_http_english.parsed.city}}
It appears that you are not a resident of Alameda County. That is okay! To find a Food Bank in your area go to <link here>
I'm sorry, something went wrong, let's try again.
What is the nearest address?

properties.body: For English, reply 'english'. Para español, responda 'español'
Ok, I can help you find food. What city are you located in?

properties.say: Ok, just a moment while I look that up.

I found {{flow.variables.pantry_name}}. It is located at {{flow.variables.pantry_address}} in {{flow.variables.pantry_city}}. It is open {{flow.variables.pantry_day}} from {{flow.variables.pantry_open}} until {{flow.variables.pantry_close}}. It is {{flow.variables.pantry_distance}} away . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Say repeat, another option, or continue.
I'm sorry, there are no food distribution sites available at this time.
We can help you apply for CalFresh Food over the phone. Please call us at 1-877-847-3663.
Thank you! We are here to help. For more information about our organization, visit a c c f b dot org.
Would you like me to repeat that information?
For additional locations or to speak to one of our Food Helpline operators, please call 510-635-3663.  Helpline hours are Monday - Friday, 9am - 4pm.
Would you like me to repeat that?

properties.body: Ok, what is the nearest address?
It appears that you are not a resident of Alameda County. That's okay! To find a Food Bank in your area go to : (Add Link)
Sorry, something went wrong. Let's try again.

I'm sorry, I couldn't find any open distribution sites. For additional locations or to speak to one of our Food Helpline operators, please call 510-635-3663.  Helpline hours are Monday - Friday, 9am - 4pm.

I found {{flow.variables.pantry_name}}.
It is located at {{flow.variables.pantry_address}} in {{flow.variables.pantry_city}}.
It is open {{flow.variables.pantry_day}} from {{flow.variables.pantry_open}} until {{flow.variables.pantry_close}}.
It is {{flow.variables.pantry_distance}} away.
For another option, reply "another option"
Thank you! We are here to help. For more information about our organization, visit accfb.org. We can also help you apply for CalFresh Food over the phone. Please call us at 1-877-847-3663.

properties.say: Do you need help with food right away?

Our Food Bank team members can help you apply for CalFresh Food benefits. If approved, you will receive a debit-like card, called EBT, that you can use to buy groceries. Are you interested in learning more?

properties.body: Do you need help with food right away?  Reply "yes" or "no"

Our Food Bank team members can help you apply for CalFresh Food benefits. If approved, you will receive a debit-like card, called EBT, that you can use to buy groceries. We can help you apply for CalFresh Food over the phone. Please call us at 1-877-847-3663.

properties.say: ¿Necesita ayuda con la comida de inmediato?
¿En que ciudad estas?
properties.hints: Berkeley, Albany, Oakland, Alameda, San Leandro, Hayward, San Lorenzo, Castro Valley, Union City, Newark, Livermore, Dublin, Pleasanton, Sonol, Emeryville, Fremont, Piedmont, Ashland, Cherryland, Fairview

properties.say: gracias, solo un momento por favor.
Lo siento, algo salió mal, intentemos de nuevo.
Parece que no eres residente del condado de Alameda. ¡Eso está bien! Para encontrar un banco de alimentos en su área, vaya a <link here>
Puedo ayudarte a encontrar comida en {{widgets.valid_city_http_spanish.parsed.city}}.
¿Cuál es la dirección más cercana?
Gracias, solo un momento mientras busco eso.
Lo siento, no hay sitios de distribución de alimentos disponibles en este momento.

Encontré {{flow.variables.pantry_name}}. Se encuentra en {{flow.variables.pantry_address}} en {{flow.variables.pantry_city}}. Está abierto {{flow.variables.pantry_day}} desde {{flow.variables.pantry_open}} hasta {{flow.variables.pantry_close}}. Está {{flow.variables.pantry_distance}} de distancia. . . . . . . . . . . . . . Di repetir, otra opción, o continuar.

Los miembros de nuestro equipo de Food Bank pueden ayudarlo a solicitar los beneficios de CalFresh Food. Si se aprueba, recibirá una tarjeta de débito, llamada EBT, que puede usar para comprar comestibles. ¿Estás interesado en aprender más?

Para ubicaciones adicionales o para hablar con uno de nuestros operadores de la Línea de ayuda alimentaria, llame al 510-635-3663. El horario de la línea de ayuda es de lunes a viernes de 9 a.m. a 4 p.m.
Podemos ayudarlo a solicitar CalFresh Food por teléfono. Por favor llámenos al 1-877-847-3663.
¿Quieres que repita eso?
¡Gracias! Estamos aquí para ayudar. Para obtener más información sobre nuestra organización, visite a c c f b dot org.
¿Quieres que repita eso?
